name: Simple Slide Deck & Presentation Template
description:
This is a simple but robust presentation template and slide deck that can be used for consulting, investor or sales pitches.


This free version has a lot, and there's a PRO version for $9 on Gumroad - see here...


https://samwhiteman.gumroad.com/l/sokhs


It is built for simplicity, consistency and speed so you're able to focus on the message.


It includes:

  • 40+ components
  • More than 10 pre-built slide templates that are easily versioned in to dozens of possibilities
  • 3 Colors built-in
  • Autolayout used
  • Logo, Footer and Header components for scaling your brand.
  • Hero image placeholders


The PRO version just has more stuff to save you time.


  • 150+ components instead of ~40
  • 26 colors instead of 3
  • More examples
  • More infographic options
  • Sans and Sans Serif options


If you have feedback, @ me or drop a note in the comments.
